title: Fully publish current draft and run post-publish smoke check

requirements.text: Fully publish the currently deployed draft (Draft Version 12) so the latest frontend and backend changes are live (not just a draft deployment).
acceptanceCriteria: The application is successfully fully published (go-live) from the current draft (Draft Version 12) without deployment errors.
The published app URL serves the latest version (not the prior published build).

requirements.text: After publication succeeds, manually verify the published build using the existing checklist in `frontend/DEPLOYMENT_SMOKE_CHECK.md`, ensuring that all core routes load and that the Reader Dashboard is reachable at `/dashboard` and via the primary navigation on both desktop and mobile screen sizes.
acceptanceCriteria: On the published deployment, the routes `/`, `/tracker`, and `/dashboard` load successfully.
The Dashboard page is reachable via the header primary navigation on desktop and via the mobile navigation menu on small screens.
A direct visit to `/dashboard` renders the Reader Dashboard page (not a 404, blank page, or redirect loop).

constraints: Do not modify files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose them only).
Do not edit any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`).
nonGoals: Do not introduce new product features beyond publishing and verification.
Do not redesign UI/UX as part of this publish request.
Do not change backend data models or add new canister methods unless required to unblock publishing.
